  <div class="bd rec">

    <div class="pic">

    <div class="content">
    <div class="title">
        <a href="https://movie.douban.com/subject/30458963/" target="_blank" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;1&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2428345138&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"

          <span class="allstar45"></span>
          <strong class="rating_num">8.8</strong>
    </div>
    
    <p>去年在FOD播出的描述男性同性爱连续剧《情色小说家》的过去篇——《情色小说家~靛...
    <div class="info">
    <ul>
            <li><span class="label">导演:</span><span>三木康一郎 Kôichirô Miki</span>
            <li><span class="label">主演:</span><span>竹财辉之助 Terunosuke Takezai</span>
            <li><span class="label">类型:</span><span>剧情 爱情 同性</span>
    </ul>
    </div>
    </div>
  </div>




  

<div class="actions">
  
  <span class="created_at" title="2019-03-09 17:59:53"><a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180473832/status/2428345138/">昨天</a></span>

  <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180473832/status/2428345138/" class="btn btn-action-reply new-reply" data-action-type="showComments" data-count="39">
    39回应
  </a>

      &nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180473832/status/2428345138/" class="btn btn-key-like  btn-like " data-action-type="like" >赞</a>

      <span class="count like-count" data-count="157">(157)</span>


    &nbsp;&nbsp;<a class="btn btn-key-reshare btn-reshare new-reshare " data-action-type="reshare" >转发</a>
       <span class="count reshared-count" data-count="18">(18)</span>



</div>

    <div class="new-status status-wrapper    " data-sid="2424170114" data-uid="180441686" >

    
    






<div class="status-item"
    data-sid="2424170114"
    data-uid="180441686"
    data-action="0"
    data-target-type="rec"
    data-object-kind="1047"
    data-object-id="220559">
<div class="mod" data-status-id="2424170114">
  
  <div
    class="hd "
    data-status-url="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/status/2424170114/">
    

  <div class="usr-pic">
    <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2424170114&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1047&#34;})"
 title="新片情报局"><img src="https://img3.doubanio.com/icon/u180441686-1.jpg" alt="新片情报局"/></a>
  </div>
  <div class="text">
    <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2424170114&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1047&#34;})"
 class="lnk-people">新片情报局</a>
        :
      <a href="https://douc.cc/2mtvrB" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2424170114&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1047&#34;})"
>《魔神Z 劇場版 マジンガーZ / INFINITY‎ (2018)》日本先行版</a>
    
    

<blockquote class=quote-clamp>
  

  <p>《魔神Z》定档，将于2019年03月08日上映。邪恶天才科学家地狱博士（石冢运升 配音）企图征服世界，人类因此而陷入灭亡危机，在驾驶魔神Z的兜甲儿（森久保祥太郎 配音）以及其他伙伴们的努力下，世界得以恢复和平。十年后，兜甲儿不再是超级机器人的驾驶员，而是成为了一名科学家。某日，他在富士山地底见到了被埋在山底的超巨大遗迹——INFINITY无限魔神，以及同时出现的神秘生命体“莉莎”（上坂堇 配音）。而在同一时刻，地狱博士突然神秘地复活了，他还打算利用INFINITY无限魔神所潜藏的无限可能性，完成他征服世界的野心……就在这千钧一发之际，传说中的驾驶员兜甲儿与魔神Z再次挺身而出拯救人类…</p>
</blockquote>

  </div>

  </div>

  <div class="bd rec">
    
  <div class="block-video">
      
      

  
  
  
    <div class="video-player"

>
        <div class="video-player-poster">
          <img src="https://movie.douban.com/trailer/220559/image" />

<div class="status-item"
    data-sid="2424116305"
    data-uid="180441686"
    data-action="0"
    data-target-type="rec"
    data-object-kind="1002"
    data-object-id="26899146">
<div class="mod" data-status-id="2424116305">
  
  <div
    class="hd "
    data-status-url="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/status/2424116305/">
    
  
  <div class="usr-pic">
    <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2424116305&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"

  </div>
  <div class="text">
      <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2424116305&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"
 class="lnk-people">新片情报局</a>
      分享电影
    
    

<blockquote class=quote-clamp>
  

  <p>《雪暴》定档，将于2019年04月26日上映。在灾难级的暴雪降临极北的边陲小镇之际，一场惊心动魄的警匪对决也即将上演……</p>
</blockquote>

  </div>

  </div>

  <div class="bd rec">
    



<div class="block block-subject">
    <div class="pic">
        <a href="https://movie.douban.com/subject/26899146/" target="_blank" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2424116305&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"
 title="雪暴‎ (2018)" class="media"><img src="https://img3.doubanio.com/view/status/small/public/4o6erd.jpg"></a>
    </div>
    <div class="content">
    <div class="title">
        <a href="https://movie.douban.com/subject/26899146/" target="_blank" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2424116305&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"
>雪暴‎ (2018)</a>
          <span class="allstar00"></span>
          <strong class="rating_num"></strong>
    </div>
    
    <p>电影《雪暴》讲述了在一座极北的边陲小镇，一伙穷凶极恶、作案手法老到的悍匪为褫...
    <div class="info">
    <ul>
            <li><span class="label">导演:</span><span>崔斯韦 Siwei Cui</span>
            <li><span class="label">主演:</span><span>张震 Chen Chang</span>
            <li><span class="label">类型:</span><span>动作 犯罪 悬疑</span>
    </ul>
    </div>
    </div>
  </div>




  

<div class="actions">
  
  <span class="created_at" title="2019-03-05 15:27:01"><a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/status/2424116305/">3月5日</a></span>

  <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/status/2424116305/" class="btn btn-action-reply new-reply" data-action-type="showComments" data-count="13">

        </form>
    </div>

        :
      <a href="https://douc.cc/3Kkl0y" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2422949578&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1047&#34;})"
>《致命梦魇‎ (2019)》预告片：剧情版 (中文字幕)</a>
    
    

<blockquote class=quote-clamp>
  

  <p>《致命梦魇》定档，将于2019年03月29日上映。电影《致命梦魇》聚焦心理学犯罪，巧妙结合民间传说“鬼压床”现象，营造前所未有的惊悚恐怖画风。电影主人公迷失自我，噩梦缠身。他隐藏一个惊天秘密...自杀还是谋杀？所有一切究竟是巧合还是人为操纵？事情远非想象的那么简单...影片将揭开人性善恶的层层迷雾，带给你扣人心弦的心理惊悚感！</p>
</blockquote>

  </div>

  </div>

    <div class="new-status status-wrapper    " data-sid="2422895302" data-uid="180441686" >

    
    






<div class="status-item"
    data-sid="2422895302"
    data-uid="180441686"
    data-action="0"
    data-target-type="rec"
    data-object-kind="1002"
    data-object-id="30164448">
<div class="mod" data-status-id="2422895302">
  
  <div
    class="hd "
    data-status-url="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/status/2422895302/">
    
  
  <div class="usr-pic">
    <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2422895302&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"
 title="新片情报局"><img src="https://img3.doubanio.com/icon/u180441686-1.jpg" alt="新片情报局"/></a>
  </div>
  <div class="text">
      <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180441686/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2422895302&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"
 class="lnk-people">新片情报局</a>
      分享电影
    
    

<blockquote class=quote-clamp>
  

  <p>《海市蜃楼》定档，将于2019年03月28日上映。《看不见的客人》导演、西班牙悬疑大师奥里奥尔·保罗新作悬念升级。25年前一个风暴将至的夜晚，小男孩尼克目睹了邻居杀妻的全过程，被凶手发现的他在逃跑途中被车撞死。尼克死去25年后，幸福的已婚妇女维拉（阿德丽安娜·尤加特 饰）搬进了尼克住过的这所房子。一场和25年前一样的风暴让两段时空交错，惊醒的维拉发现自己竟能与电视机里的尼克跨时空对话。维拉透过电视机试图挽救这个男孩的性命，却引发一系列连锁反应——女儿消失、丈夫和身边的人全都不再认识和相信自己。于是，维拉只能在风暴消失前有限的15小时里，与唯一相信她的莱拉警长（奇诺·达林饰）解开所有谜团…</p>
</blockquote>

  </div>

  </div>

  <div class="bd rec">
    



<div class="block block-subject">
    <div class="pic">
        <a href="https://movie.douban.com/subject/30164448/" target="_blank" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2422895302&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"
 title="海市蜃楼 Durante la tormenta‎ (2018)" class="media"><img src="https://img3.doubanio.com/view/status/small/public/1wnhqn.jpg"></a>
    </div>
    <div class="content">
    <div class="title">
        <a href="https://movie.douban.com/subject/30164448/" target="_blank" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2422895302&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"
>海市蜃楼 Durante la tormenta‎ (2018)</a>
          <span class="allstar00"></span>
          <strong class="rating_num"></strong>
    </div>
    
    <p>《看不见的客人》导演、西班牙悬疑大师奥里奥尔·保罗新作悬念升级。25年前一个风...
    <div class="info">
    <ul>
            <li><span class="label">导演:</span><span>奥里奥尔·保罗 Oriol Paulo</span>
            <li><span class="label">主演:</span><span>哈维尔·古铁雷斯 Javier Gutiérrez</span>
            <li><span class="label">类型:</span><span>爱情 科幻 悬疑</span>
    </ul>
    </div>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="new-status status-wrapper    " data-sid="2422744938" data-uid="180441686" >

    
    






<div class="status-item"
    data-sid="2422744938"

      <a href="https://douc.cc/3gBMKS" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2422744938&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1047&#34;})"
>《夜伴歌声‎ (2019)》先行版 (中文字幕)</a>
    
    

<blockquote class=quote-clamp>
  

  <p>《夜伴歌声》定档，将于2019年03月22日上映。午夜别墅，传来一个死去女孩的歌声！恐怖时刻，又惊现尖细妖魅的女鬼笑声，突如其来的掏心利爪，画中人眼角渗出的血泪，划向脖颈的手术刀，在走廊空中漂浮的玫瑰花……一连串心惊胆寒的离奇事件接踵而至，难道只是因为死去女孩的男友找了新女友，遭致女鬼缠身？！躲不过的凶险与惊悚，最终汇集在一间神秘的地下室，血光与尖叫中，唱歌的女鬼倏然现身……</p>
</blockquote>

  </div>

  </div>

<!-- 2421462000, say.html, -->




      
    
      
      






    
  
    <div class="new-status status-wrapper    " data-sid="2421130165" data-uid="180473832" >

    
    






<div class="status-item"
    data-sid="2421130165"
    data-uid="180473832"
    data-action="0"
    data-target-type="rec"
    data-object-kind="1047"
    data-object-id="243613">
<div class="mod" data-status-id="2421130165">
  
  <div
    class="hd "
    data-status-url="https://www.douban.com/people/180473832/status/2421130165/">
    

  <div class="usr-pic">
    <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180473832/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2421130165&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1047&#34;})"
 title="8分剧集新成员"><img src="https://img3.doubanio.com/icon/u180473832-1.jpg" alt="8分剧集新成员"/></a>
  </div>
  <div class="text">
    <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/180473832/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2421130165&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1047&#34;})"
 class="lnk-people">8分剧集新成员</a>
        :
      <a href="https://douc.cc/2t8UvX" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;0&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2421130165&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1047&#34;})"
>《都挺好‎ (2019)》预告片：终极版 (中文字幕)</a>
    
    

<blockquote class=quote-clamp>
  

  <p>又有豆瓣8分以上的电视剧了，《都挺好》8.4分，3585人评价。</p>
</blockquote>

  </div>

  </div>

  <div class="bd rec">
    
  <div class="block-video">

  <p>又有豆瓣8分以上的电视剧了，《圈套》8.5分，1003人评价。</p>
</blockquote>

  </div>

  </div>

  <div class="bd rec">
    



<div class="block block-subject">
    <div class="pic">
        <a href="https://movie.douban.com/subject/30328748/" target="_blank" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;1&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2420967405&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"
 title="圈套 트랩‎ (2019)" class="media"><img src="https://img3.doubanio.com/view/status/small/public/4xIyHn.jpg"></a>
    </div>
    <div class="content">
    <div class="title">
        <a href="https://movie.douban.com/subject/30328748/" target="_blank" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;1&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmb-2420967405&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;rec&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1002&#34;})"
>圈套 트랩‎ (2019)</a>
          <span class="allstar40"></span>
          <strong class="rating_num">8.1</strong>
    </div>
    
    <p>该剧为OCN与电影制作方联手打造的2019全新系列“戏剧电影院（Dramatic Cinema）”...
    <div class="info">
    <ul>
            <li><span class="label">导演:</span><span>朴信宇 Shin-woo Park</span>
            <li><span class="label">主演:</span><span>李瑞镇 Seo-jin Lee</span>
            <li><span class="label">类型:</span><span>剧情 犯罪 惊悚</span>
    </ul>
    </div>
    </div>
  </div>

<div class="new-status status-wrapper" data-aid="708732853" data-atype="note" data-uid="137594156" >
  
  






<div class="status-item" data-aid="708732853" data-atype="note">
  <div class="mod">
    <div class="hd">
      
<div class="usr-pic">
  <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/">
    <img src="https://img3.doubanio.com/icon/user_normal_f.jpg" alt="[已注销]"/>
  </a>
</div>
<div class="text">
  <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/" class="lnk-people">[已注销]</a>
  写了新日记
</div>

    </div>
    <div class="bd">
      
    
    <div class="article-pic">
      <div class="pic-wrap">
          <a href="https://www.douban.com/note/708732853/" target="_blank"><img src="https://img1.doubanio.com/view/note/l/public/p58524367.jpg"></a>
          <span class="valign"></span>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
      <div class="title">
        <a href="https://www.douban.com/note/708732853/"}>生门2 完结</a>
      </div>
      <p>
        生门2 第五个 李双双 第五个妈妈李双双，产妇妊娠高血压，家人无法承担胎儿残障欲引产。 对这个故事印象深刻的一段对话，是李双双的老公，不带一丝情感的说道，我们地方医院优生科说，建议打掉，如果小孩有问题，...
        <a href="https://www.douban.com/note/708732853/">（全文）</a>
      </p>
    </div>
  
      
<div class="actions">
  
  <span class="created_at" title="2019-03-02 09:24:04"><a href="https://www.douban.com/note/708732853/">3月2日</a></span>

  <a href="https://www.douban.com/note/708732853/"
     class="btn btn-action-reply new-reply"
     data-count="5">
    5回应
  </a>

      
      &nbsp;&nbsp;<a
                    href="https://www.douban.com/note/708732853/"
                    class="btn btn-key-like  btn-like"
                    data-action-type="react"
                    data-activity-reaction="1">赞</a>



  &nbsp;&nbsp;<a class="btn btn-key-reshare btn-reshare new-reshare" data-action-type="reshare">转发</a>

</div>

    </div>
  </div>
</div>


</div>

    
      
      






    
  
    <div class="new-status status-wrapper    saying" data-sid="2420059854" data-uid="137594156" >

    
    





<div class="status-item"
    data-sid="2420059854"
    data-uid="137594156"
    data-action="1"
    data-target-type="sns"
    data-object-kind="1018"
    data-object-id="">
<div class="mod" data-status-id="2420059854">
  
  <div
    class="hd "
    data-status-url="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/status/2420059854/">
    


  <div class="usr-pic">
    <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;1&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2420059854&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;sns&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1018&#34;})"
 title="[已注销]"><img src="https://img3.doubanio.com/icon/user_normal_f.jpg" alt="[已注销]"/></a>
  </div>
  <div class="text">
    <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;1&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2420059854&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;sns&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1018&#34;})"
 class="lnk-people">[已注销]</a>

    说:


  </div>

  </div>

  <div class="bd sns">
    

<div class="status-saying">
  

<blockquote class=quote-clamp>
  

  <p>“贞妇”二字，见于《礼记·丧服四制》。春秋时，鲁君的女儿，有一个嫁给宋国的，称为宋伯姬。一天晚上，宋国失火，伯姬说：“妇人夜出，必待傅姆。”（傅姆是老年的男女侍从。必待傅姆，是不独身夜行，以避嫌疑的意思。）傅姆不至，不肯下堂，遂被火烧而死。《春秋》特书之，以示奖励（《公羊》襄公三十年）。</p>
</blockquote>



</div>





  

<div class="actions">
  
  <span class="created_at" title="2019-03-02 06:41:58"><a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/status/2420059854/">3月2日</a></span>

  <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/status/2420059854/" class="btn btn-action-reply new-reply" data-action-type="showComments" data-count="0">
    回应
  </a>

      &nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/status/2420059854/" class="btn btn-key-like  btn-like " data-action-type="like" >赞</a>

      <span class="count like-count" data-count="2">(2)</span>


    &nbsp;&nbsp;<a class="btn btn-key-reshare btn-reshare new-reshare " data-action-type="reshare" >转发</a>



</div>

<!-- 2420059854, say.html, -->




      
    
      
      






    
  
    <div class="new-status status-wrapper    saying" data-sid="2419809624" data-uid="137594156" >

    
    





<div class="status-item"
    data-sid="2419809624"
    data-uid="137594156"
    data-action="1"
    data-target-type="sns"
    data-object-kind="1018"
    data-object-id="">
<div class="mod" data-status-id="2419809624">
  
  <div
    class="hd "
    data-status-url="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/status/2419809624/">
    


  <div class="usr-pic">
    <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;1&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2419809624&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;sns&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1018&#34;})"
 title="[已注销]"><img src="https://img3.doubanio.com/icon/user_normal_f.jpg" alt="[已注销]"/></a>
  </div>
  <div class="text">
    <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/" 
  
  onclick="moreurl(this, {&#34;action&#34;: &#34;1&#34;, &#34;from&#34;: &#34;nmbp-2419809624&#34;, &#34;target_type&#34;: &#34;sns&#34;, &#34;object_kind&#34;: &#34;1018&#34;})"
 class="lnk-people">[已注销]</a>

    说:


  </div>

  </div>

  <div class="bd sns">
    

<div class="status-saying">
  

<blockquote class=quote-clamp>
  

  <p>愿将赏心乐事与众人享，而遇见坎坷难题便不再说。快乐是没有后遗症的情绪，像鸟儿放飞到丛林，任它飞就是了。而在灰色情绪里，即便倾吐，问题依然虎视眈眈摆在那里，只想集中精力全然理性地直面它，解决它，与最亲近的人分担。成为一个扎实做事的人，而不是停下来抱怨的人。“美好”这个词太单薄了，希望是能咽下苦，亦尝得甜，去享用生活的好，也学着解开生活的难。所以逢山开路，遇水架桥，执意往前走就是了，路总是越走越宽的。</p>
</blockquote>



</div>





  

<div class="actions">
  
  <span class="created_at" title="2019-03-01 23:25:56"><a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/status/2419809624/">3月1日</a></span>

  <a href="https://www.douban.com/people/137594156/status/2419809624/" class="btn btn-action-reply new-reply" data-action-type="showComments" data-count="0">

  </a>

            <span class="bn-flat js-verify-account" data-is-verified="True" data-verify-url="https://www.douban.com/accounts/phone/verify"><input type="submit" value="发表回应" data-type="status-comment"></span>
            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="add-more-comments">继续回应</a>
        </form>
    </div>
  </div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>






</div>
<!-- 2419602911, say.html, -->




      
</div>

window.crt_uid = "179744577";

    ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
    ga.setAttribute('async', 'true');
    document.documentElement.firstChild.appendChild(ga);
};

    window.addEventListener('load', _ga_init, false);
} else {
    window.attachEvent('onload', _ga_init);
}
</script>
